title: JonnyDrama
author: JonnyDrama
content: Hey Guys, How are you today? I would like to know about a recommended platform for hiring affiliates with their own data. I have many projects (crypto-related)  that I'm willing to market and I need quality marketers.thanks to the helpers

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I don't know of crypto-related platform like this but i knew websites with affiliates uses impact.com, i have an affiliate account there for managing 2 websites, both hosting sites. They might accept crypto-related sites but of course it should follow their rules, like payments is in USD or EUR instead of crypto. Here are some[1] alternative of impact. Well most sites uses their own platform for affiliates, tracking, earning, and available media assets. [1] https://www.trustradius.com/products/impact/competitors

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JonnyDrama on September 16, 2023, 05:36:34 PMI would like to know about a recommended platform for hiring affiliates with their own data. I have many projects (crypto-related)  that I'm willing to market and I need quality marketers.thanks to the helpersBest to present your crypto projects first. If they are really good and promising, you will have no problem finding interested promoters. Each industry has its own specific market and requires a different approach to promotion. Also, if it is a question of ethically questionable services (cloud mining, money doublers, MLM, etc.), you may find it more difficult here, considering that this forum tries to stick to white-label businesses.Of course, you can always start a marketing campaign, which is perhaps the most effective way to start, because you can't expect only influencers to represent your brand/business.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Post your products and services that you want to promote first, your platforms of choice are very limited so instead of looking for platforms why not set up one for yourself.WordPress is the best platform to start your affiliate campaigns you can use these themes to set up onehttps://www.wpbeginner.com/showcase/best-wordpress-themes-for-affiliate-marketing/By setting up your own you are the one that will lay out the plans and terms instead of under the terms of a platform and there are a lot of tutorials online about affiliate WordPress setting up. If you are going to develop products in the long term it's better to create a platform of your own.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: If you want to make it a bit more automated, simply create an affiliate program that's decently attractive for advertisers. If you have an attractive-enough affiliate program, just market it a bit — then you should be getting a lot of interested advertisers as long as your offer seems realistic and that your platform isn't scammy.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Finding affiliates is dependent on the commission you are providing per referral. Seeing such a dedicated or targeted platform for affiliates can be rare, but finding affiliate marketers isn’t. But, you’ll have to build some reputation for these marketers to trust you. So, set up a website and build reviews, then reach out to affiliate marketers. If you don’t have intentions of setting up such websites, internet marketing forums have boards for affiliate marketers, where you can get such marketers. But, I’m wondering if you’re an affiliate looking to pay other marketers to spread your referral link to different platforms. If it’s not your idea, then why don’t you think the affiliate marketers will prefer to work with the projects directly. So, in your search for affiliate marketers, you’ll have to break down your goals and motives to their understanding. It’ll help get things straight. Not just coming to say, you need affiliate marketers. There are lots of question answers expected from your side.
